Reviews.Title: Short Life
Reviews.Author: EverybodyHas1
Reviews.Content: The camera was great for about 4 uses....I purchased it for my 50th birthday trip to the Caribbean.  Took great pix, but on day 3 developed black spots (imagine pixel-like grouping)within the photos.  SUX!!!

Reviews.Title: Took OK pictures....
Reviews.Author: MissMish510 "Always Looking For A Deal :)"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a mess from day 1. The lag on this thing is ridiculous....my phone has a small lag but shoots faster than this....and even when you press the picture button all the way it doesnt take a picture so you have to try to take your pictures again.....and sometimes the 1st time would have been the perfect shot.....or you miss a shot....the charging was funny because sometimes it would charge right up and others it would seem to take forever....You get what you pay for so buyers beware......it finally broke on me and I just didnt feel like going through the trouble of camera shopping so i've been using my phone.....now with my birthday coming up I will need a camera for this week of fun out of town.....I have a Panasonic now......I'll keep you posted.

Reviews.Title: LCD screen is defective
Reviews.Author: fred
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera in September, five months later the screen developed swirly lines and blurry images. Olympus refused to owner the warranty and stated that was due to possibly a drop or mishandling yet the camera didn't have a scratch on it.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: goodman15
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a cruise the family was going on,and it worked out great. The flash when i needed it, and the great zoom pictures taken. When I didnt shoot, it would fit nicely in my pocket. add a 8mb card and theres over 600 pictures to take. The price was good but now others on the market are comparable in price. I don't regret buying because i didn't have to shop for it.

Reviews.Title: Camera blues
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Instruction sheet is too general and does not cover several features or uses.  Need more detail about some features to fully appreciate this product.Had to call tech support for some guidance.  Because I bought this through Amazon I had to beg for help because we were leaving in a couple of days for a big vacation.
